Item.method_code:
Dim myInnovator As Innovator = Me.newInnovator() Dim allClasses = Me.GetItemsByXPath("//Item[@type='TrainingClass']") Dim SqlResults, RowItem As Item
Dim sql As String Dim i As Integer = 0 For i=0 To allClasses.getItemCount()-1 sql = "SELECT count(*) FROM innovator.[TrainingClass_Identity] WHERE source_id='" & allClasses.getItemByIndex(i).getID() & "'" SqlResults = myInnovator.applySQL(sql) Dim testSqlRes = SqlResults.getItemsByXPath("//row").dom.InnerText If (testSqlRes = 0) allClasses.getItemByIndex(i).setProperty("students", 0) Return Me End If allClasses.getItemByIndex(i).setProperty("students", testSqlRes) Next Return Me
Item.name: TrainingClass onGet
